overview: Angelika Grays — a beautiful blonde Ukrainian woman — leads a very quiet life. Every day she spends hours on the transport to work, but it doesn't seem to bother her too much. As an accountant in a small business, she likes to keep everything tidy, both in the office and in her private life. Like all young women her age, she has had several love affairs but has not yet met the ideal man. Luckily for her, this will soon change.
title: Angelika, an Indecent Story
